trans-unit.source: Requirements for database-side JDBC routines using nested connections

seg-source.mrk: Requirements for database-side JDBC routines using nested connections

target.mrk: Requirements for database-side JDBC routines using nested connections

trans-unit.source: In order to preserve transactional atomicity, database-side JDBC routines that use nested connections have the following limitations.

seg-source.mrk: In order to preserve transactional atomicity, database-side JDBC routines that use nested connections have the following limitations.

target.mrk: In order to preserve transactional atomicity, database-side JDBC routines that use nested connections have the following limitations.

trans-unit.source: Can issue a commit or rollback only within a procedure (not a function).

seg-source.mrk: Can issue a commit or rollback only within a procedure (not a function).

target.mrk: Can issue a commit or rollback only within a procedure (not a function).

trans-unit.source: Cannot change the auto-commit connection attribute.

seg-source.mrk: Cannot change the auto-commit connection attribute.

target.mrk: Cannot change the auto-commit connection attribute.

trans-unit.source: Cannot modify the data in a table used by the parent statement that called the routine, using INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE. For example, if a SELECT statement using the T table calls the changeTables procedure, changeTables cannot modify data in the T table.

seg-source.mrk: Cannot modify the data in a table used by the parent statement that called the routine, using INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE.
For example, if a SELECT statement using the T table calls the changeTables procedure, changeTables cannot modify data in the T table.

target.mrk: Cannot modify the data in a table used by the parent statement that called the routine, using INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE.
For example, if a SELECT statement using the T table calls the changeTables procedure, changeTables cannot modify data in the T table.

trans-unit.source: Cannot drop a table used by the statement that called the routine.

seg-source.mrk: Cannot drop a table used by the statement that called the routine.

target.mrk: Cannot drop a table used by the statement that called the routine.

trans-unit.source: Cannot be in a class whose static initializer executes DDL statements.

seg-source.mrk: Cannot be in a class whose static initializer executes DDL statements.

target.mrk: Cannot be in a class whose static initializer executes DDL statements.

trans-unit.source: In addition, the Connection object that represents the nested connection always has its auto-commit mode set to false.

seg-source.mrk: In addition, the Connection object that represents the nested connection always has its auto-commit mode set to false.

target.mrk: In addition, the Connection object that represents the nested connection always has its auto-commit mode set to false.
